title: expected a table, but found a array for `target.wasm32-unknown-unknown.ranlib`
body:
- macOS 12.5
- Rust nightly-2022-07-11

According to https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/config.toml.example#L656

my `.cargo/config.toml`

```toml
[target.wasm32-unknown-unknown]
ar = "/opt/homebrew/opt/llvm/bin/llvm-ar"
ranlib = "/opt/homebrew/opt/llvm/bin/llvm-ranlib"
```

When I'm compiling https://github.com/Phala-Network/khala-parachain 
It errored with
```
error: failed to run custom build command for `rhala-parachain-runtime v0.1.17-dev (/Users/jasl/Workspaces/BlockChain/khala-parachain/runtime/rhala)`

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `/Users/jasl/Workspaces/BlockChain/khala-parachain/target/release/build/rhala-parachain-runtime-d409eead87464af5/build-script-build` (exit status: 1)
  --- stdout
  Information that should be included in a bug report.
  Executing build command: "/Users/jasl/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2022-07-11-aarch64-apple-darwin/bin/cargo" "rustc" "--target=wasm32-unknown-unknown" "--manifest-path=/Users/jasl/Workspaces/BlockChain/khala-parachain/target/release/wbuild/rhala-parachain-runtime/Cargo.toml" "--color=always" "--profile" "release"
  Using rustc version: rustc 1.64.0-nightly (c396bb3b8 2022-07-10)


  --- stderr
  error: expected a table, but found a string for `target.wasm32-unknown-unknown.ranlib` in /Users/jasl/Workspaces/BlockChain/khala-parachain/.cargo/config.toml
```
